texts.biography: Usually someone as taciturn as Jonathan is rather not a good leader. This time, however, the exception proves the rule and as a result Kastore's army gained a great general.
texts.name: Jonathan

specialty.name: Guards
specialty.description:
{Guards and Militians}

Increases Speed of any Guards or Militians by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every level (rounded up).
